```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

This app aims to observe the Q-Q plot and normal distribution, link to the app: https://kanyanee.shinyapps.io/qqplot/.

*How to use the app?*

Step 1: Pick the mean, standard deviation, and sample size.

Step 2: Click on the Random button.
